com.vectorprint.report.data

Class BlockingDataCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vectorprint.report.data.DataCollectorImpl
      • com.vectorprint.report.data.BlockingDataCollector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataCollector<ReportDataHolderImpl>, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    public abstract class BlockingDataCollector
extends DataCollectorImpl
implements Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
    Implementation of a DataCollector that uses a BlockingDeque for collecting and processing data, so it starts processing data immediately after it becomes available. This implementation makes it possible to use a separate Thread for collecting data and processing data.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl
    See Also:
    BaseReportGenerator.processData(com.vectorprint.report.data.ReportDataHolder)

      static class  BlockingDataCollector.QUEUECONTROL
      Signals the end of the data stream to the queue consumer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReportDataHolderImpl collect()
      Starts a data collecting Thread that will call collectData()
      abstract void collectData()
      add your data using this method, BE SURE TO have a consumer for your data, by default BaseReportGenerator.processData(com.vectorprint.report.data.ReportDataHolder) will consume your data, but if you override BaseReportGenerator.createReportBody(com.itextpdf.text.Document, com.vectorprint.report.data.ReportDataHolder, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter), your report application may fail.
      ReportDataHolderImpl getDataHolder()
      get a reference to the object that will contain report data

      • collectData

        public abstract void collectData()
        add your data using this method, BE SURE TO have a consumer for your data, by default BaseReportGenerator.processData(com.vectorprint.report.data.ReportDataHolder) will consume your data, but if you override BaseReportGenerator.createReportBody(com.itextpdf.text.Document, com.vectorprint.report.data.ReportDataHolder, com.itextpdf.text.pdf.PdfWriter), your report application may fail.
